name: Snowbird (itch)
description:
A snowboarding game where you are NOT a professional

The objective is simple: Board down to the bottom of the slope! 

The line emitting from the board shows the amount of drag being applied to the board. If it turns red, you're leaning in a direction that will cause you to fall over!

Tip: Lean to one edge to test before a Hard Lean

Controls: Restart: R

Rotate: A , D

Lean Toeside: W

Lean Heelside: S

Hard Lean: L Shift + W or L Shift + S
